meanings.definition: relating to the study of crystals

meanings.sent3: The crystallographic order in the gemstone was so precise, it seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent4: His crystallographic mind saw the world as a beautifully organized crystal lattice.
meanings.sent5: The crystallographic arrangement of molecules in the substance was like a harmonious dance of atoms.
